name: Welsh Alphabet Dragon Jigsaw
description:
These beautiful multicoloured dragon jigsaws are handmade in Sri Lanka by Lanka Kade and feature the Welsh alphabet. The pieces are made from rubber wood.

This item is not recommended for children under 12 months.

Product dimensions: 540x133mm

name: English Alphabet Dragon Jigsaw
description:
These beautiful multicoloured dragon jigsaws are handmade in Sri Lanka by Lanka Kade and feature the English alphabet. The pieces are made from rubber wood.

This item is not recommended for children under 12 months.

Product dimensions: 540x133mm

name: Long handled shopping bags bearing the Fair Do’s Siopa Teg logo
description:
These bespoke long -handled cotton shopping bags made by the Bishopston Trading co. are the perfect reusable replacement for a plastic bag. 

The long handled bags are ideal for carrying the bag over your shoulder. Let everyone know that you support local business as well as producers in developing countries by carrying the Fair Do’s Siopa Teg logo around with you! Dimensions: 41x33cm with a 12.5cm gusset.

name: Welsh Dragon bilingual boxer shorts
description:
Boxer shorts made by "Pants to Poverty", with unique Welsh logo.

These fairtrade cotton boxer shorts are made by Pants to Poverty (www.pantstopoverty.com) but carry a logo and slogan unique to Fair Do’s -  Cymru: Masnach Deg lawr i nhrons  (Wales : Even our pants are Fairtrade) - alongside a bold Welsh dragon.

These would make an excellent gift for the ethically-minded man in your life!

Sizes S, M,L and XL; colour Black.

LIMITED STOCK AVAILABLE

name: Handmade Welsh Thank You (Diolch) Card
description:
These beautiful handmade cards are made by Cards From Africa (www.cardsfromafrica.co.uk). The Welsh language greetings are unique to Fair Do’s.

Our card is lovingly handcrafted in Rwanda by young people who have been orphaned by genocide or disease. All the paper is handmade from local Rwandan office waste, making it environmentally sustainable, too. 

The card dimensions are 11.5 cm x 16 cm (4.5” x 6.3”) and an envelope is included. The inside of the card is blank.

We cannot guarantee that your card will be identical to this photo, as each card is handmade. The back of the card is often signed by the maker of the card (signatures will therefore vary).

name: Fair Trade Welsh Blend Coffee (250g) from Colombia
description:
250g Roast and ground coffee beans - a smooth blend for the Welsh palate. 

100% Pure Arabica Colombian coffee, roasted and ground from a specially selected crop to produce a superior medium strength coffee. Suitable for cafetieres and filter coffee machines.

Strength: 3/5

name: Three packs Fair Trade Welsh Blend Coffee (250g) from Colombia
description:
Three packs each of 250g roast and ground coffee beans - a smooth blend for the Welsh palate.

100% Pure Arabica Colombian coffee, roasted and ground from a specially selected crop to produce a superior medium strength coffee. Suitable for cafetieres and filter coffee machines.

Strength: 3/5
